commit.message:
parse.y (strip_out_static_field_access_decl): Return operand if it satisfies JDECL_P.

	* parse.y (strip_out_static_field_access_decl): Return operand if
	it satisfies JDECL_P.

From-SVN: r29086

files.patch:
